translation.en: [POPPY] Once upon a time...
translation.zh: 很久很久以前

translation.en: in a happy forest, in the happiest tree...
translation.zh: 在一座欢乐森林里 有一棵精灵树 （快乐）

translation.en: lived the happiest creatures the world has ever known.
translation.zh: 树上住着世界上最快乐的生灵

translation.en: The Trolls.
translation.zh: 魔发精灵

translation.en: They loved nothing more
translation.zh: 他们最喜欢做三件事

translation.en: than to sing, and dance, and hug.
translation.zh: 分别是唱歌 跳舞 拥抱

translation.en: Dance, and hug, and sing, and dance,
translation.zh: 跳舞 拥抱 唱歌 跳舞

translation.en: and sing, and hug, and dance...
translation.zh: 唱歌 拥抱 跳舞 拥抱 跳舞

translation.en: and hug, and dance, and sing, and hug, and dance, and hug...

translation.en: But then one day,
translation.zh: 可是有一天

translation.en: the Trolls were discovered by... a Bergen!
translation.zh: 博啃族发现了精灵

translation.en: The Bergens didn't know how to sing... [SINGING OFF-KEY] or dance...
translation.zh:
博啃族不会唱歌
不会跳舞 更不会拥抱

translation.en: or even hug.
translation.zh: （啊呀）

translation.en: They were the most miserable creatures in all the land.
translation.zh: 他们简直就是世界上最郁闷的生物

translation.en: And once they saw how happy the Trolls were...
translation.zh: 他们看到精灵们那么快乐

translation.en: they wanted some of that happiness for themselves.
translation.zh: 他们也想得到属于自己的快乐

translation.en: [ALL GASP] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 苍天啊

translation.en: Eating a Troll made them feel so happy...

translation.en: they started a tradition.
translation.zh: 于是他们定下了一个传统

translation.en: Once a year, every year...
translation.zh: 每年都有那么一天

translation.en: the Bergens would gather around the Troll Tree...
translation.zh: 所有博啃人会聚集到精灵树下

translation.en: to taste happiness...
translation.zh: 品尝快乐的滋味

translation.en: on a holiday they called...

translation.en: Trollstice.
translation.zh: 精灵美食节

translation.en: Good morning, Daddy!

translation.en: Daddy, wake up!

translation.en: Daddy! Daddy! Daddy! Daddy!

translation.en: It's Trollstice!

translation.en: Trollstice! Our one day to be happy.

translation.en: Yeah!

translation.en: [ALL CHANTING] Trolls! Trolls! Trolls! Trolls! Trolls! Trolls!

translation.en: Me.

因为我们中有个人
还没尝过精灵的味道

-假的

-波比公主来啦

我们应该驱逐她 -住手 你们要干吗？

-别再让我看到她

-住手 你们要干吗？
-别再让我看到她 从今往后 不许她再踏入博啃镇半步 她毁了我们的美食节 （能带来快乐的脸庞）

-和谐

干得漂亮

我们只能去找新家了 大家抓紧时间
要赶在博啃族回来前离开

大家抓紧时间
要赶在博啃族回来前离开

-布兰 你被邀请了

translation.en: What? No.

translation.en: Oh, that's great. You're the one guy who knows more about Bergens than anyone...

好极了
你是我们之中最了解博啃族的

translation.en: but when we finally need you,

translation.en: you just want to hide here forever?

我要愿意蓄汗当水喝的话
就能活十一年

怎么不用你做剪贴薄的本事

对了 布兰

不 别进来 等等

translation.en: Branch, my man! You are right on time.
translation.zh: 布兰 哥儿们 你来得正好

translation.en: Oh, right. Like you knew I was coming.
translation.zh: 说得好像你知道我会来似的

translation.en: Yes! I figured after the third hug time...
translation.zh: 没错 我猜你被抱抱过三次之后

translation.en: getting eaten by a Bergen wouldn't seem so bad.
translation.zh: 应该会宁愿被博啃族吃掉

translation.en: And I figured there was no way you could do this by yourself.
translation.zh: 我猜你一个人根本不可能搞定这事

translation.en: Guess we were both right.
translation.zh: 看来我们都猜对了

translation.en: Hmm. All right. Let's do this!

translation.en: Sooner we get to Bergen Town,
translation.zh: 越快到达博啃镇

translation.en: sooner we can rescue everybody... and make it home safely.
translation.zh:
就能越快把大家救出来
然后平安回家

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. What's your plan?
translation.zh: 等等 你有什么计划？

translation.en: I just told you. To rescue everyone and make it home safely.
translation.zh:
我刚说了
把大家救出来 然后平安回家

translation.en: Okay. That's not a plan. That's a wish list.
translation.zh: 好吧 这不叫计划 这叫美好的愿望

translation.en: Oh! I suppose you have a plan.

translation.en: First... we get to the edge of Bergen Town without being spotted.
translation.zh: 首先我们悄悄走到博啃镇的外围

translation.en: Then, we get inside by sneaking through the old escape tunnels...
translation.zh: 然后从以前挖的逃生地道溜进去

translation.en: which will then lead us to the Troll Tree... right before we get caught,
translation.zh: 可以直达精灵树 万一我们被抓住

translation.en: and suffer a miserable death... at the hands of a horrible, bloodthirsty Bergen!
translation.zh:
就会惨死在嗜血恐怖的
博啃族的魔掌下

translation.en: Hold on a second, are you scrapbooking my plan?

translation.en: Uh-huh. Yeah. Almost... done!

translation.en: [RECORDED VOICES] We did it!

translation.en: There will be no more...

translation.en: scrapbooking.

translation.en: [BRANCH] Do you have to sing?

translation.en: [POPPY] I always sing when I'm in a good mood.
translation.zh: 我一高兴就唱歌

translation.en: [POPPY] Why wouldn't I be?

translation.en: By this time tomorrow, I'll be with all my friends!

translation.en: Oh, I wonder what they're doing right now.

translation.en: Probably being digested.
translation.zh: 可能在被消化吧

translation.en: They're alive, Branch. I know it!

translation.en: You don't know anything, Poppy.

translation.en: And I can't wait to see the look on your face... when you realize the world

translation.en: isn't all cupcakes and rainbows.

translation.en: 'Cause it isn't. Bad things happen... and there's nothing you can do about it.

世道险恶 灾难丛生
你根本无力改变

translation.en: Hey, I know it's not all cupcakes and rainbows.

translation.en: But I'd rather go through life thinking that it mostly is...

translation.en: instead of being like you.

translation.en: You don't sing, you don't dance.

translation.en: So grey all the time! What happened to you?

translation.en: A Bergen?

translation.en: [SOFTLY] Maybe.
translation.zh: 有可能

translation.en: There's no Bergen, is there?

translation.en: You just said that so I'd stop talking.
translation.zh: 你只是想让我闭嘴而已

translation.en: [SOFTLY] Maybe.
translation.zh: 有可能

translation.en: So special.
translation.zh: 多么与众不同

translation.en: Good night, Cooper.

translation.en: And good night, Poppy.

translation.en: [BRANCH] Don't even think about it.

translation.en: ♪ Stars shining bright above you ♪

translation.en: Really? Seriously? More singing?

translation.en: Yes, seriously! Singing helps me relax.

translation.en: Maybe you ought to try it.

translation.en: I don't sing, and I don't relax.

translation.en: This is the way I am, and I like it.

translation.en: I also like a little silence.

translation.en: ♪ Hello Darkness, my old friend ♪

translation.en: ♪ I've come to talk with you again ♪

translation.en: Hello.

translation.en: ♪ Because a vision softly creeping ♪

translation.en: ♪ Left its seeds while I was sleeping ♪

translation.en: ♪ And the vision that was planted in my brain ♪
translation.zh: 这幻象深深植入我的脑海

translation.en: ♪ Still remains ♪

translation.en: ♪ Within the sound ♪ ♪ Of silence ♪

translation.en: May I?
translation.zh: 我能用一下吗？

translation.en: [POPPY] So one of these tunnels leads to the Troll Tree.
translation.zh: 这些地道中有一条通向精灵树

translation.en: [BRANCH] That's right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: There's so many of them. I wonder which one.

translation.en: I don't know.

translation.en: For one will lead to Bergen Town...

translation.en: and the others, to certain death. [ECHOING]

translation.en: Who said that?

translation.en: [MALE VOICE] It was...
translation.zh: 就是

translation.en: me.
translation.zh: 我

translation.en: Hey, guys, how's it going? Welcome to the root tunnels.
translation.zh: 朋友们 你们好啊 欢迎来到树根地道

translation.en: Uh, I just wanted to warn you.
translation.zh: 我只是想提醒你们

translation.en: One of these tunnels leads to the Troll Tree...
translation.zh: 只有一条地道通向精灵树

translation.en: and the others to [IN DEEP VOICE] certain death, death, death, death...
translation.zh: 而其它的则通向死亡

translation.en: Do you think you can tell us which is the right one?

translation.en: You bet!
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Great! No, that's okay. We're fine, thanks!
translation.zh:
-太好了
-不 不用了 谢谢

translation.en: Branch. [CHUCKLES NERVOUSLY] He's trying to help us.
translation.zh: 布兰 他想帮助我们

translation.en: I don't like the looks of him.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢他给我的感觉

translation.en: I mean, who wears socks with no shoes?

translation.en: He seems to know what he's talking about.

translation.en: Okay, fine.
translation.zh: 好吧 随便你

translation.en: Which way do we go?
translation.zh: 我们该走哪条路？

translation.en: First, you have to give me a high five. Then I'll tell you.
translation.zh: 首先 你要跟我击个掌 我才告诉你

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Oh, I love high fives. I'll do it.
translation.zh: 我最爱击掌了 我来吧

translation.en: Oh, I know you'll do it.
translation.zh: 我知道你愿意

translation.en: But will he?
translation.zh: 可他愿意吗？

translation.en: All right, dumpy diapers, up high!

translation.en: Nope, I don't do high fives.
translation.zh: 不 我从不击掌

translation.en: Slap it, boss. Not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 啪一个呗 大哥 做你的大头梦

translation.en: Party on the top floor. Nope.
translation.zh:
-腾空而起碰撞狂欢
-没门儿

translation.en: Little slappy. Make daddy happy.
translation.zh: 小啪一个 让爸爸乐乐

translation.en: That's weird.
translation.zh: 好诡异

translation.en: Come on, just one little high five.
translation.zh: 来吧 不过是击个掌而已

translation.en: Oh, no, thanks. I'm good.
translation.zh: 不了 谢谢 用不着

translation.en: Here, just do this...
translation.zh: 你看 就像这样

translation.en: But with your hand.
translation.zh: 只不过换成你的手

translation.en: Thank you for that demonstration.
translation.zh: 感谢你的示范

translation.en: Really cleared up exactly what I will not be doing.
translation.zh: 精确演示了我绝不会做的动作

translation.en: Branch, it's a high five.
translation.zh: 布兰 就是击个掌而已

translation.en: The others lead to certain death. Get perspective.
translation.zh:
走错了地道就是通向死亡
好好权衡下

translation.en: [SIGHS] One high five and then you'll tell us which tunnel to take, right?
translation.zh:
击个掌你就会告诉我们
走哪条地道对吗？

translation.en: So easy.
translation.zh: 小事一桩

translation.en: [GRUNTS] Okay, fine!
translation.zh: 那好 来吧

translation.en: Ooh. Too slow.
translation.zh: 太慢了

translation.en: Too slow?
translation.zh: 太慢了

translation.en: [CHUCKLES] Classic.
translation.zh: 百试不爽

translation.en: No, no. All right.
translation.zh: 好了 别生气

translation.en: I'm gonna let you slide with a fist bump.
translation.zh: 你就跟我碰个拳吧

translation.en: Whoo. Shark attack! Nom-nom-nom-nom. Jellyfish!
translation.zh: 鲨鱼攻击 啊呜啊呜 水母

translation.en: Hand sandwich. Turkey. Snowman. Dolphin.
translation.zh: 三明治 火鸡 雪人 海豚 直升机

translation.en: Helicopter. Last Supper. Monkey in a zoo.
translation.zh:
-《最后的晚餐》 动物园里的猴子
-什么？

translation.en: What? Gear shift
translation.zh: 汽车换档

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay. Now I'm thinking we hug.
translation.zh: 好了 我们还是抱一个吧

translation.en: [BRANCH] That's right. You better run, Cloud! [POPPY] Wait!
translation.zh:
-没错 快跑吧 你个破云
-不 等等

translation.en: I'm gonna tear your little cloud arms...
translation.zh: 我要把你的云朵小手

translation.en: off your cloud body,
translation.zh:
-从你的云朵身体上扯下来
-不

translation.en: and high five your face with them!
translation.zh:
-跟你的云朵大脸击个掌
-布兰

translation.en: [POPPY] He's just a cloud!
translation.zh: 他只是一朵云

translation.en: [BRANCH] Get back here! [POPPY] Branch! He can help us!
translation.zh:
-给我回来
-布兰 他能帮我们

translation.en: [BRANCH] Come back!
translation.zh: 给我回来

translation.en: [POPPY] Run, Cloud Guy! I'm gonna kill you!
translation.zh:
-快跑 云哥
-我要杀了你

translation.en: Ta-da! We're here!
translation.zh: 锵锵 我们到了

translation.en: You guys are a lot of fun. You know, I gotta go.
translation.zh: 你们太欢乐了 我得走了

translation.en: Got some cloud stuff to take care of. Catch you on the way back?
translation.zh:
我还要上天去办点事
等你们回去时再见

translation.en: Unless... you die. [IMITATES ECHO FADING]
translation.zh: 除非你们死了

translation.en: The Troll Tree.
translation.zh: 精灵树

translation.en: Bergen Town.
translation.zh: 博啃镇

translation.en: [ALL] ♪ I ain't happy I'm feeling glad ♪
translation.zh: 我不快乐 但感觉还不错

translation.en: ♪ I got sunshine in a bag I'm useless ♪
translation.zh: 我曾经也拥有过阳光 我一无是处

translation.en: ♪ But not for long The future is coming on ♪
translation.zh: 但不会太久 因为未来就在眼前

translation.en: ♪ I ain't happy I'm feeling glad ♪
translation.zh: 我不快乐 但感觉还不错

translation.en: I got sunshine in a bag I'm useless ♪
translation.zh: 我曾经也拥有过阳光 我一无是处

translation.en: ♪ But not for long The future is coming on ♪
translation.zh: 但不会太久 因为未来就在眼前

translation.en: ♪ Is coming on Is coming on ♪ ♪ Coming on Is coming on ♪ ♪ Is coming on Is coming on ♪
translation.zh: 就在眼前

translation.en: Wow! They're as miserable as you.
translation.zh: 它们和你一样郁闷

translation.en: Which means they haven't eaten a Troll yet.
translation.zh: 也就是说它们还没有吃到精灵

translation.en: Now, come on. Let's go save our friends.
translation.zh: 快走吧 去救我们的朋友们

translation.en: Your friends.
translation.zh: 你的朋友

translation.en: Our friends. Don't fight it.
translation.zh: 我们的朋友 别纠结了

translation.en: Oh, Barnabus.
translation.zh: 鳄霸哥

translation.en: You're my only friend in this whole miserable world.
translation.zh: 你是我在这个郁闷的世界上 唯一的朋友

translation.en: Dad was right.
translation.zh: 爸爸说得对

translation.en: I'll never ever, never ever, never be happy.
translation.zh: 我永远永远永远永远不会快乐了

translation.en: Never.
translation.zh: 永远

translation.en: [CHEF] Never say never.
translation.zh: 万事皆有可能

translation.en: Chad. Todd.
translation.zh: 查德 托德

translation.en: Chef, where did you come from?
translation.zh: 大厨 你是从哪儿冒出来的？

translation.en: My father banished you 20 years ago.
translation.zh: 我父亲明明在二十年前驱逐了你

translation.en: Have you been standing behind that plant this whole time?
translation.zh: 难道你一直都躲在盆栽后面？

translation.en: If only, sire.
translation.zh: 我也想 陛下

translation.en: No. I've been out in the wilderness...
translation.zh: 这些年我漂泊在外

translation.en: thinking of nothing but how I let you down.
translation.zh: 反省当年我是如何让您失望的

translation.en: If only there was some way I could make you feel better.
translation.zh: 我一直在想怎么才能让您好受一些

translation.en: Well, fat chance!
translation.zh: 不可能了

translation.en: The only way I'll ever be happy is by eating a Troll...

translation.en: and that ain't gonna happen, thanks to you.
translation.zh: 可多亏了你 现在不可能了

translation.en: Ah, but it just might. Thanks to me.
translation.zh: 陛下所言极是 多亏了我

translation.en: You found the Trolls.
translation.zh: 你找到了精灵

translation.en: So this means I might actually get to be happy!

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 说得对

translation.en: Of course, everyone else in Bergen Town will still be miserable...

translation.en: but that's not your concern.

translation.en: I am their king, so maybe it kinda is.
translation.zh: 可我现在是国王了 所以应该有点关系吧

translation.en: What exactly are you proposing?

translation.en: Bringing back Trollstice? For everyone?

translation.en: Yes! That's exactly what I'm proposing.
translation.zh: 没错 这就是我的提议

translation.en: Great idea, sire. Absolutely brilliant.
translation.zh: 说得好 陛下 这主意简直酷毙了 您真是机智

translation.en: Aren't you smart?
translation.zh: 这主意简直酷毙了 您真是机智

translation.en: [CHUCKLES] I guess I am.
translation.zh: 我想也是

translation.en: And I, your loyal Chef, will be right behind you.
translation.zh: 每个成功国王的背后 都有个支持他的大厨

translation.en: Holding a knife. What's that?
translation.zh: 手握菜刀 啥？

translation.en: Holding a knife, a spoon, a ladle.
translation.zh: 我是说手握菜刀 汤勺 长柄勺

translation.en: I'm your chef, after all!
translation.zh: 我是您的大厨不是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, you sure are!
translation.zh: 对 太有道理了

translation.en: I'm back!
translation.zh: 我回来了

translation.en: You, scullery maid, what's your name?
translation.zh: 你 洗碗妹 你叫什么？

translation.en: Uh, Bridget.
translation.zh: 布里吉

translation.en: Congratulations, Idget. You work for me now. So you take those dishes downstairs
translation.zh:
恭喜你“布吉利”成为我的手下
现在把这些碗碟拿下去

translation.en: and you start scrubbing.
translation.zh: 用最快的速度洗掉

translation.en: Yes, Chef. Thank you, Chef.
translation.zh: 是的 大厨 谢谢 大厨

translation.en: Shh. Don't cry, Mr. Dinkles. Shh!
translation.zh: 别哭 叮叩先生

translation.en: Guys, Mr. Dinkles is really freaking out!
translation.zh: 伙计们 叮叩先生好像真的被吓傻啦

translation.en: Whoa, whoa! Everyone, we must all remain calm.
translation.zh: 别紧张 大家跟着我一起舒展

translation.en: [CHANTING] ♪ Comb ♪
That's right. [GASPS]
translation.zh:
说得对 “梳梳”更健康
口感更松脆

translation.en: A calm Troll is a tasty Troll.
translation.zh:
说得对 “梳梳”更健康
口感更松脆 你们将是我成功之作里
不可或缺的食材

translation.en: And you are a key ingredient in my recipe for success.
translation.zh:
你们将是我成功之作里
不可或缺的食材

translation.en: [TROLLS GASPING] You see... he who controls the Trolls controls the Kingdom.
translation.zh: 要知道 得精灵者得天下

translation.en: And I am that "he"!
translation.zh: 我迟早会成为这儿的一国之君

translation.en: You're a dude? [GRUNTS]
translation.zh: 你是男的？

translation.en: By this time tomorrow, I'll be queen...
translation.zh: 明天这个时候 我将成为这儿的女王

translation.en: and all of Bergen Town will get exactly what they deserve.
translation.zh:
整个博啃镇将得到
他们梦寐以求的东西

translation.en: True happiness!
translation.zh: 真正的快乐

translation.en: Chad. Todd.
translation.zh:
-查德
-托德

translation.en: So where do you think our friends are?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们的朋友会在哪儿？

translation.en: If I had to guess, I'd say in a Bergen's stomach.
translation.zh: 如果非要猜的话 我猜 他们在某个博啃人的胃里

translation.en: Could you try to be positive?
translation.zh: 你就不能阳光积极点吗？

translation.en: Just once. You might like it.
translation.zh: 哪怕一次 你会喜欢那种感觉的

translation.en: Okay. I'm sure they're not only alive...
translation.zh: 好吧 我确定他们不仅没死

translation.en: but about to be delivered to us on a silver platter.
translation.zh: 而且还舒舒服服地躺在盘子上

translation.en: [SIGHS] Thank you. That wasn't so hard, was it?
translation.zh: 谢谢 乐观也没那么难对吧？

translation.en: [GASPS] Branch!
translation.zh: 布兰

translation.en: Hug time? Seriously? [SHUSHING]
translation.zh: 又要抱 不是吧？ 你听

translation.en: Listen.
translation.zh: 你听

translation.en: This is gonna be the best Trollstice ever!
translation.zh: 这将是有史以来最棒的精灵美食节

translation.en: Such a great idea I had.
translation.zh:
-真是机智如我
-没错

translation.en: [CHEF] Yes. Tomorrow is Trollstice, everyone.
translation.zh: 明天就是精灵美食节了 各位

translation.en: And it must be perfect! [ALL] Yes, Chef!
translation.zh:
-必须做到完美
-是的 大厨

translation.en: Feels great to be ordering everyone around again.
translation.zh: 重新在这儿发号施令的感觉真好

translation.en: Branch, look! They're alive?
translation.zh:
-布兰 快看
-他们还活着

translation.en: And on a silver platter, too. We were both right.
translation.zh: 而且真的在盘子上 我们都猜对了

translation.en: And to mark the occasion, Your Highness, look.
translation.zh: 为了纪念这一重要的时刻

translation.en: I found your old Troll bib.
translation.zh: 我还找到了您儿时的精灵围兜

translation.en: [KING GRISTLE] Oh, wow! I bet you still fit.
translation.zh: 希望还能戴得上

translation.en: [RASPY] Like a glove!
translation.zh: 刚刚好

translation.en: Oh, you think that's funny?
translation.zh: 你觉得很好笑吗？

translation.en: We'll see who's laughing when I bite your yummy head off.
translation.zh: 等我把你们的脑袋一个个咬下来时

translation.en: When I bite all y'alls yummy heads off.
translation.zh: 看你们还笑不笑得出来

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 等等 大厨

translation.en: Chef, this isn't enough yummy heads
translation.zh: 等等 大厨 就这么几个精灵

translation.en: to feed all of Bergen Town.
translation.zh: 怎么够分给所有人呢？

translation.en: How are we supposed to have Trollstice if there's not enough Trolls?
translation.zh:
没有精灵的美食节
怎么能叫精灵美食节呢？

translation.en: Oh, there's plenty more where that came from, sire.
translation.zh: 不用担心 到时候还会有更多精灵

translation.en: [KING GRISTLE] Are you sure? Because I promised everyone a Troll.
translation.zh:
你确定？
我可是答应过所有人都有份的

translation.en: [CHEF] No, no, no, sire! Everything will be fine.
translation.zh: 陛下 您就放一百二十个心吧

translation.en: If I were truly worried... would I be willing to do this?
translation.zh:
如果我做不到的话
我还会这么做吗？

translation.en: Creek!
translation.zh: 克里克

translation.en: Oh, my first Troll!
translation.zh: 我的第一只精灵

translation.en: Go on, eat, King Gristle.
translation.zh: 快吃吧 格里森国王

translation.en: Enjoy a taste of true happiness.
translation.zh: 慢慢享用快乐带给您的美妙滋味

translation.en: Shouldn't we wait for Trollstice?
translation.zh: 还是等到美食节再吃吧

translation.en: [TROLLS] Phew. Sire, every day is Trollstice when you have Trolls.
translation.zh:
陛下 只要有了精灵
每天都是美食节

translation.en: Yeah, I guess.
translation.zh: 说的也是

translation.en: But my dad said the first time should be special.
translation.zh: 可爸爸说第一次吃应该讲究些

translation.en: Well, you're the king now. [CREEK GROANING]
translation.zh: 现在您是国王了

translation.en: Yeah, I am the king.
translation.zh: 对 现在我是国王

translation.en: But I think I should share this moment
translation.zh: 我还是觉得该和大家一起分享

translation.en: with all the kingdom.
translation.zh: 这一时刻 快吃

translation.en: Mmm.
translation.zh: 苍天啊

translation.en: Oh, my God! No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 漂亮

translation.en: Idget, lock these Trolls in your room
translation.zh: 布吉利 把这几个精灵锁到你的房间里

translation.en: and guard them with your life.
translation.zh: 给我小心看管

translation.en: Yes, Chef.
translation.zh: 是的 大厨

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I know.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: Branch, we have to save him!
translation.zh: 布兰 我们得去救他

translation.en: Save him from what? His stomach?
translation.zh: 去哪儿救他？国王肚子里吗？

translation.en: We didn't see him chew. We didn't see him swallow!
translation.zh:
我们没看到他咀嚼
也没看到他咽下去

translation.en: Face it, Poppy.
translation.zh: 接受现实吧 波比 有时候一些人进了另一些人的嘴里

translation.en: Sometimes people go into other people's mouths...
translation.zh: 有时候一些人进了另一些人的嘴里

translation.en: and they don't come out.
translation.zh: 就出不来了

translation.en: If we go after Creek now, we're going to get eaten.
translation.zh: 如果我们现在去救他 我们也会被吃掉

translation.en: I'm sorry... but it's too late for him.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾 可已经来不及了

translation.en: Huh. Poppy!

因为它知道你的微笑
远远比它耀眼夺目

translation.en: I kinda do have a nice smile, don't I?

translation.en: Yes, you do.

translation.en: I can't believe I'm about to say this...

translation.en: But being here with you today...

translation.en: makes me realize that true happiness is possible.

translation.en: It is!

translation.en: Mmm. That's pretty, I guess.

-我要慢慢把玩这个小家伙
-救命

告诉我 美女
你会来参加精灵美食节吗？

translation.en: Well, duh. I'll be working.

translation.en: It!

translation.en: It. Working it. You know...

translation.en: workin' it.
translation.zh: 你懂的 用我的无限魅力

translation.en: Yeah! You're not kidding, you will.

translation.en: Because you're gonna be there as my plus one.

translation.en: Really?

translation.en: Assuming you'll say yes?

translation.en: Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Yes!

translation.en: Meantimes, maybe we should find some other way to...

translation.en: work up an appetite.
translation.zh: 活动身体促进食欲？

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What did you have in mind?

translation.en: Your Majesty.

translation.en: You seem to be having... fun.

translation.en: Oh, I am! Meet the lovely Lady Glittersparkles.

我是很开心 向你介绍
美丽的晶闪闪女士

translation.en: You remind me of someone.

translation.en: She's, uh, gonna be my plus one.

translation.en: Oh, I see.

translation.zh:
有那么一秒钟我还担心
您会改变计划呢

translation.en: Well, this won't be a problem at all, Your Highness.

translation.en: I'll just get my worthless scullery maid to get...

translation.en: another place setting ready for the lovely...

translation.en: Lady Glittersparkles.
translation.zh: 再多准备一套餐具给这位美丽的 晶闪闪女士

translation.en: [KING GRISTLE] Put her place setting next to mine.

translation.en: Hey! Lady Glittersparkles?

translation.en: [SOFTLY] I miss you already.

translation.en: I think the king really likes us.

translation.en: I know, right?

translation.en: Thanks, Poppy.

translation.en: Thanks to all of you!

translation.en: Even you, I guess.

translation.en: And it just did!

translation.en: I'm so excited I could just scream.
translation.zh: 我兴奋地忍不住想尖叫

我也忍不住想尖叫
克里克还活着 太好了

translation.en: Nothing. I thought we were celebrating.
translation.zh: 没怎么 我们不是在庆祝吗？

translation.en: That's your happy shout?

translation.en: It's been a while.

translation.en: Well, you're gonna have plenty of practice,

translation.en: because we're gonna save Creek...

translation.en: and life will be all cupcakes and rainbows again.

translation.en: Up top!

translation.en: Too slow.

好了 大伙儿
我们去把克里克救出来

好了 大伙儿
我们去把克里克救出来 好嘞 走起

晶闪闪女士
要作为国王的女伴出席晚宴

translation.en: Yeah, I think we're gonna have to skip that one.

translation.en: No! No, you have to help me be Lady Glittersparkles.

translation.en: I need you.

translation.en: You and the king can make each other happy!

translation.en: That's impossible!

translation.en: Only eating a Troll can make you happy.

translation.en: Everyone knows that!

translation.en: I wish I'd never gone on this stupid date!

translation.en: Just go! Get out of my room. Leave me alone.

-拜托你 听我说
-布里吉

translation.en: We've gotta go. Bridget...

-我们得走了 快来
-布里吉

translation.en: Bridget, scrub that dish!

translation.en: Yes, Chef. [SOBBING]

我只要在八小时之内
减掉三十磅就行了

translation.en: There it is!

translation.en: ♪ I feel good I feel good ♪ ♪ I feel good I feel good ♪ ♪ I feel good ♪

translation.en: Hurry! It's stuck!

translation.en: Run!

translation.zh:
-大家快上去 快点
-我们走

-布兰 整个儿递给我
-走 快走

translation.zh: 大伙儿注意保持平衡

translation.en: Eat glitter!

translation.en: Hold on!
translation.zh: 抓紧了

translation.en: Creek! [ALL GASP]

translation.zh: 布兰

translation.zh: 你得救了 不

抱歉 明天晚宴开始前
我不能让你们离开

translation.en: I mean every Troll in Troll Village.

translation.en: You'll never find them. Not where they're hiding.

-克里克 你还活着

吃其他精灵
随便你吃谁 吃光都可以 就是别吃我

translation.zh: 我只能背着这份罪孽度过我的余生

translation.en: Creek?

translation.en: [ALL CHANTING] Trollstice! Trollstice! Trollstice!

translation.en: Now let's prepare the main course.

translation.en: The Trolls!

translation.en: [GASPS] Poppy?

translation.en: Poppy! Oh, thank goodness you're all right.

translation.en: I'm doing great.

translation.en: I got everybody I love thrown in a pot.

我害得所有我爱的伙伴
都被扔进了锅里

translation.en: Thanks for asking.

translation.en: Poppy? Are you being... sarcastic?

translation.en: Yes!

translation.en: Oh, my God!

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't know why I thought I could save you.
translation.zh: 对不起 我竟然真以为自己能救大家

translation.en: All I wanted to do was keep everyone safe, like you did, Dad.

translation.en: But I couldn't.
translation.zh: 但我没能做到

translation.en: Poppy.
translation.zh: 波比

translation.en: I let everyone down.
translation.zh: 我让大家失望了

translation.en: [SIGHS] But, Poppy...

translation.en: You were right, Branch.
translation.zh: 你是对的 布兰

translation.en: The world isn't all cupcakes and rainbows.

translation.en: [SOFTLY] Poppy.
translation.zh: 波比

translation.en: [BRANCH] ♪ You with the sad eyes ♪
translation.zh: 你眼神好哀伤

translation.en: ♪ Don't be discouraged ♪
translation.zh: 不要感到气馁

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I realize ♪
translation.zh: 我明白

translation.en: ♪ It's hard to take courage ♪

translation.en: ♪ In a world full of people ♪
translation.zh: 这世界太过熙攘

translation.en: ♪ You can lose sight of it all ♪
translation.zh: 会令人迷失其中

translation.en: ♪ The darkness inside you ♪ ♪ Can make you feel so small ♪

translation.en: What are you doing? The king is waiting.
translation.zh:
你在这儿磨蹭什么？
国王等着呢

translation.en: Get those Trolls out there!
translation.zh: 快把这些精灵端出去

translation.en: Sorry, Chef.
translation.zh: 抱歉 大厨

translation.en: Oh, you are sorry.

translation.en: ♪ Show me a smile then ♪

translation.en: ♪ Don't be unhappy, can't remember when ♪

translation.en: ♪ And you've taken all you can bear ♪

translation.en: ♪ Just call me up ♪

translation.zh: 我一直在你身旁

translation.en: ♪ And I see your true colors ♪ ♪ Shining through ♪

translation.en: ♪ I see your true colors ♪ ♪ And that's why I love you ♪
translation.zh: 我看到你真实的色彩让我爱慕

translation.en: ♪ So don't be afraid ♪
translation.zh: 所以不要害怕

translation.en: ♪ To let them show ♪

translation.en: ♪ Your true colors ♪
translation.zh: 你真实的色彩

translation.en: ♪ True colors are beautiful ♪
translation.zh: 真实的色彩如此美丽

translation.en: ♪ I see your true colors ♪ ♪ Shining through ♪ ♪ True colors ♪
translation.zh: 我看到你真实的色彩难掩光芒

translation.en: ♪ I see your true colors ♪ ♪ That's why I love you ♪
translation.zh: 我看到你真实的色彩让我爱慕

translation.en: ♪ So don't be afraid ♪
translation.zh: 所以不要害怕

translation.en: ♪ To let them show ♪
translation.zh: 尽情展现出来

translation.en: ♪ Your true colors ♪
translation.zh: 你真实的色彩

translation.en: ♪ True colors ♪ [SQUEAKS]  ♪ Are beautiful ♪
translation.zh: 真实的色彩如此美丽

translation.en: ♪ Like a rainbow ♪
translation.zh: 如彩虹般美丽

translation.en: ♪ Like a rainbow ♪
translation.zh: 如彩虹般美丽

translation.en: Thank you!
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: No. Thank you.
translation.zh: 不 谢谢你

translation.en: For what?
translation.zh: 谢我什么？

translation.en: For showing me how to be happy.
translation.zh: 谢谢你教会了我如何变得快乐

translation.en: Really? You're finally happy?
translation.zh: 真的？你终于变得快乐了吗？

translation.en: Now?
translation.zh: 这会儿？

translation.en: I think so.
translation.zh: 我想是的

translation.en: Happiness is inside of all of us, right?
translation.zh: 快乐就在我们的内心深处对吗？

translation.en: Sometimes, you just need someone to help you find it.
translation.zh: 有时候你只是需要别人帮忙唤醒它

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: What are you doing?

translation.zh: 我不能让他们吃了你

translation.en: But... Come on! You gotta go!
translation.zh: 可是 快点 你们快逃

translation.en: Hurry! Go, go, go! Get out of here!

translation.en: No! Bridget, if you go in there without us,

translation.en: you know what they'll do.
translation.zh: 你知道他们会怎么处置你吗？

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: But, Bridget...

translation.en: It's okay, Poppy.
